entry.title: Monday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Clearing this evening. Wind north 20 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud late in the morning. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 40 gusting to 60 near noon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:49 PM EST Monday 06 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 11.
